package.name: node_demo_pkg
package.description: The node_demo package is designed as an introductory guide to developing ROS nodes and understanding core ROS concepts such as spinning, timers, publishers, and subscribers. This package provides a step-by-step demonstration of how to create a ROS 2 node, implement timer-based callbacks, publish messages to a topic, and subscribe to messages from a topic using rclcpp and rclpy.
